name: Office Supplies
description: Essential office equipment and supplies for daily business operations including stationery, filing systems, and desk accessories.

name: Industrial Equipment
description: Heavy-duty machinery and equipment for manufacturing, construction, and industrial applications.

name: IT & Technology
description: Computer hardware, software, networking equipment, and technology solutions for modern businesses.

name: Safety & Security
description: Personal protective equipment, safety gear, security systems, and workplace safety solutions.

name: Cleaning & Janitorial
description: Commercial cleaning supplies, janitorial equipment, and maintenance products for facilities management.

name: Food Service Equipment
description: Commercial kitchen equipment, food preparation tools, and restaurant supplies for hospitality businesses.

name: Medical & Healthcare
description: Medical devices, healthcare equipment, pharmaceuticals, and supplies for healthcare facilities.

name: Automotive Parts
description: Vehicle parts, automotive tools, maintenance equipment, and accessories for automotive businesses.

name: Construction Materials
description: Building materials, construction tools, hardware, and supplies for construction and renovation projects.

name: Electrical Components
description: Electrical parts, wiring, lighting fixtures, and electrical installation equipment for commercial use.

name: Packaging & Shipping
description: Packaging materials, shipping supplies, boxes, labels, and logistics equipment for e-commerce and shipping.

name: Laboratory Equipment
description: Scientific instruments, lab supplies, testing equipment, and research tools for laboratories and R&D facilities.

name: Furniture & Fixtures
description: Commercial furniture, office seating, desks, storage solutions, and interior fixtures for business spaces.

name: HVAC & Climate Control
description: Heating, ventilation, air conditioning systems, and climate control equipment for commercial buildings.

name: Textiles & Apparel
description: Commercial textiles, uniforms, workwear, and fabric materials for various business applications.
